OfxParamTypeChoice.name: presets
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: Set a pre-designed bubble/text designed by the Textuler team

OfxParamTypeInteger2D.name: position
OfxParamTypeInteger2D.OfxParamPropHint: Set the position of the node

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: bubbleShape
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: The shape of the bubble surrounding the text

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: bubbleSizing
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: How the size of the text bubble is driven, can be text-driven or fixed

OfxParamTypeInteger2D.name: bubbleSize
OfxParamTypeInteger2D.OfxParamPropHint: Bubble size calculated from bubble sizing

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: horizontalJustify
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: Horizontal justification of textbox to canvas

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: verticalJustify
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: Vertical justification of textbox to canvas

OfxParamTypeInteger2D.name: textCenterOffset
OfxParamTypeInteger2D.OfxParamPropHint: Set the offset of the text box in the x and y direction with 0, 0 being the center of the bubble

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: alignment
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: Alignment of the text within the bubble

OfxParamTypeString.name: textMessage
OfxParamTypeString.OfxParamPropHint: The text content of the message

OfxParamTypeString.name: attrList
OfxParamTypeString.OfxParamPropHint: Hidden parameter to store advanced text edits

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: fontFamily
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: Select the font to be used.

OfxParamTypeString.name: fontFace
OfxParamTypeString.OfxParamPropHint: Font face from selected font, pickable using the Select Font and Face button

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: fontSize
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: The height of the characters to render in pixels.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: letterSpace
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Spacing between letters.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: lineSpacing
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Spacing between each line (similar to single/double line property in word).

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: fontStretch
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: Specifies the width of the font relative to other designs in the font family

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: italics
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: Enable or disable italics for selected font

OfxParamTypeRGBA.name: bubbleBGColor
OfxParamTypeRGBA.OfxParamPropHint: The fill color of the bubble.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: bubbleBGColorOpacity
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Adjusts transparency of bubbles background color

OfxParamTypeRGBA.name: color
OfxParamTypeRGBA.OfxParamPropHint: The fill color of the text to render.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: textColorOpacity
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Adjusts transparency of text color

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: disableBubble
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Do not draw the rectangle surrounding the text

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: disableText
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Do not draw the text inside of the rectangle

OfxParamTypeString.name: emojiFont
OfxParamTypeString.OfxParamPropHint: Specifies which font face will get priority as an emoji font before fallback fonts are applied

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: bubbleExpansion
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: Expands the message bubble in all directions. Disabled if individual expansion is selected

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: topExpansion
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: Expansion of bubble towards the top

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: bottomExpansion
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: Expansion of bubble towards the bottom

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: leftExpansion
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: Expansion of bubble towards the left

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: rightExpansion
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: Expansion of bubble towards the right

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: cornerRadius
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: Sets the corner radius of the text bubble

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: topLeftRadius
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: Sets the corner radius of the top-left of the text bubble

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: topRightRadius
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: Sets the corner radius of the top-right of the text bubble

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: bottomLeftRadius
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: Sets the corner radius of the bottom-left of the text bubble

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: bottomRightRadius
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: Sets the corner radius of the bottom-right of the text bubble

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: enableTail
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Enable drawing tail at end of message box

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: tailStyle
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: Choose the style of tail to use

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: tailSide
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: Choose the side on which the tail lies

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: tailYScale
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Scale the tail in the Y direction, if applicable

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: tailXScale
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Scale the tail in the X direction, if applicable

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: tailPosition
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Changes the positioning of the tail if possible

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: borderWidth
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: Sets the border width of the text bubble

OfxParamTypeRGBA.name: borderColor
OfxParamTypeRGBA.OfxParamPropHint: The fill color of the bubble border.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: borderColorOpacity
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Adjusts the transparency of the border color of the gradient.

OfxParamTypeRGBA.name: borderStartColor
OfxParamTypeRGBA.OfxParamPropHint: Mirror the bubble gradient settings but with custom colors (border color ignored)

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: borderStartColorOpacity
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Adjusts the transparency of the border start color of the gradient.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: borderStartXPosition
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: The start x position of the border gradient as a percentage of the box

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: borderStartYPosition
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: The start y position of the border gradient as a percentage of the box

OfxParamTypeRGBA.name: borderEndColor
OfxParamTypeRGBA.OfxParamPropHint: Mirror the bubble gradient settings but with custom colors (border color ignored)

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: borderEndColorOpacity
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Adjusts the transparency of the border end color of the gradient

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: borderEndXPosition
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: The end x position of the border gradient as a percentage of the box

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: borderEndYPosition
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: The end y position of the border gradient as a percentage of the box

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: borderGradColorMidpoint
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Color midpoint for border gradient

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: isolateBorder
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Hides the bubble showing only the outline of the border

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: enableGradient
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Check to enable gradient background. Background color field will be ignored when enabled.

OfxParamTypeRGBA.name: gradStartColor
OfxParamTypeRGBA.OfxParamPropHint: The start color of the gradient.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: gradStartColorOpacity
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Adjusts the transparency of the start color of the gradient.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: startXPosition
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: The start x position of the gradient as a percentage of the box

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: startYPosition
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: The start y position of the gradient as a percentage of the box

OfxParamTypeRGBA.name: grandEndColor
OfxParamTypeRGBA.OfxParamPropHint: The end color of the gradient.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: grandEndColorOpacity
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Adjusts the transparency of the end color of the gradient.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: endXPosition
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: The end x position of the gradient as a percentage of the box

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: endYPosition
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: The end y position of the gradient as a percentage of the box

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: gradColorMidpoint
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Color midpoint for gradient

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: textReveal
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Key to control reveal of characters, words, or lines

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: revealType
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: Choice to control reveal by character, word, or line

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: revealTextOnly
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Keeps bubble size expanded while revealing text

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: humanizeDuration
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: Total duration in frames the user spends typing (defaults to project frame range)

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: humanizeTypingSpeed
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Typing speed changes how quickly the user types through words, inversely related to how much time spend pausing between words

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: humanizeAccuracy
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Probability the human makes a mistake per word, with 1 being a perfect typer

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: randomSeed
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: Value that randomizes the generator for generating various texts

OfxParamTypeString.name: mistakeCharset
OfxParamTypeString.OfxParamPropHint: Characters that users are allowed to mistakenly type

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: enableTextGradient
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Check to enable text gradient background. Text color field will be ignored when enabled.

OfxParamTypeRGBA.name: textGradStartColor
OfxParamTypeRGBA.OfxParamPropHint: The start color of the gradient.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: textGradStartColorOpacity
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Adjusts the transparency of the start color of the gradient

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: textStartXPosition
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: The start x position of the gradient as a percentage of the box

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: textStartYPosition
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: The start y position of the gradient as a percentage of the box

OfxParamTypeRGBA.name: textGradEndColor
OfxParamTypeRGBA.OfxParamPropHint: The end color of the gradient.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: textGradEndColorOpacity
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Adjusts the transparency of the end color of the gradient

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: textEndXPosition
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: The end x position of the gradient as a percentage of the box

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: textEndYPosition
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: The end y position of the gradient as a percentage of the box

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: textGradColorMidpoint
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Color midpoint for gradient

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: textStrokeWidth
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: The size of the stroke width around the text

OfxParamTypeRGBA.name: textStrokeColor
OfxParamTypeRGBA.OfxParamPropHint: The color of the text stroke

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: textStrokeOpacity
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Adjusts the transparency of the text stroke

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: enableDropShadow
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Enable Drop Shadow for inner text box

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: dropShadowDirection
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Direction of the drop shadow from 0 to 360 degrees

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: dropShadowDistance
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Distance

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: dropShadowSoftness
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Softness of blur for drop shadow

OfxParamTypeRGBA.name: dropShadowColor
OfxParamTypeRGBA.OfxParamPropHint: Color of shadow in the background

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: dropShadowOpacity
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Adjusts the transparency of the drop shadow

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: enableTextCursor
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Draws a text cursor in the given offset from the last inserted character

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: cursorOffset
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: Character offset relative to the back of the text (0 being the last character, 1 being 2nd to last, etc)

OfxParamTypeInteger2D.name: cursorPositionOffset
OfxParamTypeInteger2D.OfxParamPropHint: X and Y offset of the position of the cursor

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: cursorBlinkRate
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: On/off of blinker based on frames, a blink rate of 5 means the cursor will be on for 5 frames then off for 5

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: cursorColorOpacity
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Adjusts transparency of cursor

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: cursorHeight
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: Height of cursor in pixels. A height of 0 will cause cursor height to match the character height (auto-height)

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: cursorRoundness
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: Controls the corner rounding of the cursor

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: outputAsLinear
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Final output of emojis and color fonts as linear (useful for Nuke's)

OfxParamTypeDouble3D.name: brightnessRGB
OfxParamTypeDouble3D.OfxParamPropHint: Scale for adjusting text output RGB
